answers.answer: Dont stress mama my doctors wouldnt see me until 12 weeks but I didnt have insurance until I was 14 weeks so I know how unsettling it can be to wait for that first appointment! But dont worry, most will not see you that soon!

Im 12 weeks today and i still havent my obgyn until next monday but if u dont have any prenatal vitamins you could always go buy them at Walmart or at the stores they sell them or sometimes when you even go to the ER the doctor will prescribe some prenatal vitamins for u biy dont worry everything gonna be ok

Usually your first visit is just to confirm pregnancy and reschedule another appt to come back for ultrasound blood work and so on. Nothing to be worried about some people just find out sooner than others. I didn't see a Dr with my first until 15 weeks and she was perfectly fine
Thank you ladies so very much. You eased my wprries and i cant thank you enough. I have my pregnancy confirmation already and been on my prenatals since i found out ... seriously thank you so much
With my son I was three months before seeing my doctor.. I am 6 weeks now and dont see the doctor till the 10th

Im 7 weeks and go for the first time next week.. they didnt even have me come in to confirm.. i guess waiting a month is confirmation though.. ill just see my nurse then. I dont see my dr until 12 weeks!
My appointment isn't til 10 weeks and I'm a ftm...nervously waiting! And having soooo much discomfort with stretching.
You'll be fine! I didn't find out I was pregnant till I was 8 weeks and saw the dr at 9 weeks.. Just make sure your taking prenatal vitamins in the meantime

question: So its been a month since i found out i was prego now but still have yet to see my obgyn all info i had has come from an er visit due to my diabetes. Ill be close to 9 weeks by time i get my first actual prenatal.... i keep reading how all these moms are being seen by six weeks and im worried cause altho im not having problems i dont think. Honestly idk if i am. Im a ftm and still waiting. Has this happened to anyone else? And i have called over 15 obgyn and the closest appt i can get is on the 2 nd of sept. I dont get it.
title: i feel so behind on it all
